trans-unit.source: Provides data for loader resolution events, such as the <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve" />, <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.ResourceResolve" />, <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyAssemblyResolve" />, and <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve" /> events.
trans-unit.target: 为加载程序解析事件（如 <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.TypeResolve" />、<see cref="E:System.AppDomain.ResourceResolve" />、<see cref="E:System.AppDomain.ReflectionOnlyAssemblyResolve" /> 和 <see cref="E:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve" /> 事件）提供数据。

trans-unit.source: When the loader cannot resolve an assembly reference and a handler has been provided for the appropriate loader resolution event, the event is raised and the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs> contains information about the item to be resolved.
trans-unit.target: 当加载程序无法解析程序集引用，并提供相应的加载程序解析事件中，引发该事件处理程序已被和<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs>包含有关要解析的项的信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A> property contains the name of the item to be resolved.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A>属性包含的要解析的项的名称。

trans-unit.source: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A> property contains the assembly that requested an assembly that can provide the named item.
trans-unit.target: 开头[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]、<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A>属性包含请求可以提供命名的项程序集的程序集。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关更多信息，请参见 <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ResolveEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ResolveEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of an item to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的项的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ResolveEventArgs" /> class, specifying the name of the item to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ResolveEventArgs" /> 类的新实例，同时指定要解析的项的名称。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is typically called only by the common language runtime.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数通常仅由公共语言运行时调用。

trans-unit.source: The name of an item to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的项的名称。

trans-unit.source: The assembly whose dependency is being resolved.
trans-unit.target: 正在解析其依赖项的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ResolveEventArgs" /> class, specifying the name of the item to resolve and the assembly whose dependency is being resolved.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ResolveEventArgs" /> 类的新实例，同时指定要解析的项的名称以及正在解析其依赖项的程序集。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the item to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 获取要解析的项的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the item to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析的项的名称。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve> event, <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A> is the assembly name before policy is applied.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve>事件，<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A>是之前应用策略的程序集名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the assembly whose dependency is being resolved.
trans-unit.target: 获取正在解析其依赖项的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that requested the item specified by the <see cref="P:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 请求了 <see cref="P:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name" /> 属性指定的项的程序集。

trans-unit.source: The assembly that is returned by this property is an assembly that was unable to resolve the item specified by the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A> property, because the item did not exist in that assembly, in any of its loaded dependencies, or in any dependencies the loader could find through probing.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的程序集是无法解析指定的项的程序集<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.Name%2A>属性，因为该程序集中，不存在项中任何加载依赖项，或任何依赖关系中加载程序无法找到通过探测。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the current assembly uses the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to load assembly A from a directory outside the probing path, in order to use class CA.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假定当前程序集使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法从外部的探测路径的目录中加载程序集 A，若要使用类 CA。

trans-unit.source: Suppose further that class CA uses class CB, in assembly B, and that assembly A has a compile-time reference to assembly B, also located outside the probing path.
trans-unit.target: 假设进一步该类 CA 使用类 CB，在程序集 B 和程序集 A 具有对程序集 B 的编译时引用也位于探测路径外。

trans-unit.source: When the current assembly attempts to instantiate CA, the loader attempts to resolve the reference to assembly B. However, because assembly A was loaded by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, the loader cannot resolve the dependency.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试实例化 CA 当前程序集时，加载程序将尝试解析对程序集 b。 引用但是，因为通过使用已加载程序集 A<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，加载程序无法解析依赖项。

trans-unit.source: If there is a handler for the <xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, the event is raised, and the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A> property of the resulting <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs> object contains assembly A, because assembly A is the assembly that is missing a dependency.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有处理程序<xref:System.AppDomain.AssemblyResolve?displayProperty=nameWithType>引发事件，该事件时，与<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A>属性生成<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs>对象包含程序集 A，因为程序集 A 是程序集，缺少依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: The semantics of the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A> property vary, depending on how the requesting assembly was loaded:
trans-unit.target: 语义<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A>属性不同，具体取决于请求程序集的加载方式：

trans-unit.source: Load context: The value of the property might be `null`.
trans-unit.target: 加载上下文： 属性的值可能是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The load context is load-order independent, and the identity of the requesting assembly is not necessarily meaningful.
trans-unit.target: 加载上下文即可加载顺序无关和标识请求的程序集不一定有意义。

trans-unit.source: A non-null example occurs when the <xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is called and the specified type is not known to the requesting assembly or any of its dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 则会发生非 null 示例时<xref:System.Type.GetType%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>调用方法，并且指定的类型不知道了请求的程序集或任何其依赖项。

trans-unit.source: Load-from context: The property can be used as a probing hint, but the event handler should not get more than one request for a given assembly name.
trans-unit.target: 加载源上下文： 属性可以用作探测的提示，但事件处理程序应获取对给定的程序集名称的多个请求。

trans-unit.source: No context (that is, the requesting assembly was loaded by using the <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, or as a byte stream, or in mixed mode): The handler can use the <xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A> property to load different implementations of the same assembly based on the identity of the requesting assembly.
trans-unit.target: 没有上下文 (即，请求已加载程序集使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.LoadFile%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，或作为字节流，或在混合模式下): 处理程序可以使用<xref:System.ResolveEventArgs.RequestingAssembly%2A>属性要加载的同一个程序集的不同实现基于的标识请求的程序集。
